description: Guided hackathon participants in project development.
responsibilities: Provided technical guidance in Laravel and Python projects.
Assisted teams in debugging and optimizing their code.
Reviewed project submissions and offered constructive feedback.
achievements: Contributed to the successful completion of participant projects.
Supported teams in applying best practices and problem-solving.

description: Delivered a workshop on Python OOP fundamentals.
responsibilities: Prepared course material and coding exercises.
Conducted interactive Python sessions for learners.
achievements: Participants gained confidence in Python OOP concepts.
Received positive feedback on teaching approach.

description: Mentored learners during a week-long Laravel bootcamp.
responsibilities: Guided participants through hands-on Laravel exercises.
Reviewed code and provided feedback on best practices.
Assisted learners in troubleshooting and problem-solving.
achievements: Helped participants complete their projects successfully.
Improved learners' understanding of MVC structure and Laravel workflow.

description: Managed and promoted tech events, coordinated with local organizations for collaborations.
responsibilities: Organized multiple tech events throughout the year.
Coordinated with local organizations for event support and sponsorship.
Handled communications and public relations for events.
achievements: Built connections with partner organizations for future initiatives.
